title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Skills: Deep Understanding of Bernoulli’s Equation in Fluid Dynamics

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Explanation of three mathematical derivations of the Bernoulli equation and differentiation of their application conditions
Comparison of the physical meaning of pressure terms from an energy perspective and correction of misconceptions during experimental case analysis
Comparison of modified Bernoulli equation cases under viscous/inviscid and compressible/incompressible fluid conditions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
